subcategories.name: Executive Leadership
subcategories.description: Roles at the senior-most level of an organization, responsible for overall strategic direction and decision-making.

subcategories.name: Management
subcategories.description: Roles responsible for overseeing and directing teams or departments within an organization to achieve specific goals and objectives.

subcategories.name: Specialist
subcategories.description: Roles that require specific expertise or skills in a particular field or area of specialization.

subcategories.name: Support & Admin
subcategories.description: Roles that provide administrative, operational, or logistical support to various departments or individuals within an organization.

subcategories.name: Sales & Customer Service
subcategories.description: Roles focused on generating sales, building customer relationships, and providing excellent customer service.

subcategories.name: Insurance
subcategories.description: Roles related to the insurance industry, such as underwriters who assess and manage risks, insurance agents who sell insurance policies, risk managers who identify and mitigate potential risks, etc.

subcategories.name: Marketing & Communications
subcategories.description: Roles involved in creating and implementing marketing strategies, managing brand development, and handling internal and external communications.

subcategories.name: Franchise Development
subcategories.description: Roles dedicated to the growth and development of franchise networks, including franchise recruitment, support, and operations.

subcategories.name: Legal & Research
subcategories.description: Roles that involve legal administration, compliance, and research activities within organizations.

subcategories.name: Human Resources
subcategories.description: Roles focused on managing the human resources function, including employee relations, recruitment, training, and development.

subcategories.name: Finance & Accounting
subcategories.description: Roles involved in financial management, budgeting, accounting, and financial reporting within an organization.

subcategories.name: Operations
subcategories.description: Roles responsible for overseeing and managing day-to-day operations, ensuring efficiency and effectiveness in delivering products or services.

subcategories.name: Training & Development
subcategories.description: Roles focused on designing and delivering training programs, developing employee skills, and supporting professional development initiatives.

subcategories.name: Other
subcategories.description: Any role that does not fit into one of the other categories mentioned above.
